channel.title: Can someone help me with this error?
channel.description: [code]client.java:388: cannot find symbol symbol : variable AnimationReset location: class client AnimationReset = true; ^ client.java:397: cannot find symbol symbol : variable AnimationReset location: class client AnimationReset = true; ^ client.java:406: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyHP location: class client if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) ^ client.java:408: cannot find symbol symbol : variable EnemyHP location: class client hitDiff = EnemyHP; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Can someone help me with this error?
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

[quote=“puresdeath, post:3, topic:202150”]its not a special, its auto ancients watch thius is the code

public void iceBarrage() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) //Auto Ice Barrage { TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); //iceBarrage(); animation(441, EnemyY, EnemyX); AnimationReset = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; actionAmount++; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; hitDiff = 29 + misc.random(2); actionTimer = 2; setAnimation(1979); AnimationReset = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true; double TotalExp = 0; TotalExp = (double)(30000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerMagic); if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP; } } }[/quote]

Try deleting the codes in the error.
Test it.
Tell me how it goes.

Read full topic
